entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
